mapper.select:
select a.* From file_submit a Where 0=0
and a.id in (select submitId from submit_teacher where isSubmit=#{isSubmit})
and a.id in (select submitId from submit_teacher t1 join teacher_info t2 on t1.teacherId=t2.id where t2.userId=#{userId} )
order by createdate desc

Select count(1) From file_submit a Where 0=0
and a.title like '%${title}%'
and a.id in (select submitId from submit_teacher t1 join teacher_info t2 on t1.teacherId=t2.id where t2.userId=#{userId} )
and a.creator=#{creator}
mapper.update: update file_submit set status = #{status} Where id=#{id}
mapper.select: Select a.*,(select name from view_user where id=a.creator) creatorName,b.name fileName From file_submit a left join (select id,name from file_management union select id,name from top_folder) b on a.fileId=b.id Where 0=0 And a.id=#{id}
